name: Hit the Ball (Florin Pain)
description:
Note: If your game in browser does not start or takes too long to start, simply refresh the page and try again.

---------------------------------------------------------

How far can you reach in this game?  Take the first 10-15 levels as a training. The more you go, the more adictive will be.

A different kind of shooter, with pointy edges and unlimited fun. With every level, the speed and the number of targets is increased.

This game should run at 60+ FPS. You can enjoy this game in browser but please consider downloading the game to enjoy it at full performances if you encounter low frame rate in browser version (the browser version is limited to browser capabilities).

Featuring binary saving data system, this game saves your progress and you can play again later from where you left. However, keep in mind that if you play this game in Browser, if you are using Incognito or other private modes, the data will be wiped away when you close the browser. If you play this game in Windows PC version, your progress will always be there for you, unless you start a new game. The data saving is cross-platform, meaning that if you play on Windows version this game, then you play it in browser, you should be able to pick up at the level you left.

This game is still in development, as I will introduce skins, game currency and more. Enjoy and leave a comment if you have any suggestions.
